english.segment1: Chorus: I give myself away. I give myself away. So You can use me. I give myself away. I give myself away. So You can use me
english.segment2: Verse 1: Here I am. Here I stand. Lord, my life is in your hands. Lord, IÂ’m longing to see. Your desires revealed in me. I give myself away
english.segment3: Verse 2: Take my heart. Take my life. As a living sacrifice. All my dreams all my plans. Lord I place them in your hands
english.segment4: Chorus: I give myself away. I give myself away. So You can use me. I give myself away. I give myself away. So You can use me
english.segment5: Chorus: I give myself away. I give myself away. So You can use me. I give myself away. I give myself away. So You can use me
english.segment6: Bridge(7X): My life is not my own. To you I belong. I give myself, I give myself to you.
